item.title: Charlie Puth - We Don't Talk Anymore [DROELOE Remix]
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: F G Am
We Don’t Talk Anymore by Charlie Puth, featuring Selena Gomez. It’s been lowered by 4 semitones to beginner ukulele students can play along.
Link to Original: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3AtDnEC4zak
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Charlie Puth - Attention
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Attention on the ukulele by Charlie Puth. The chords used are Em D Bm C.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Charlie Puth - Done for Me
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Done For Me by Charlie Puth featuring Kehlani on the ukulele. The chords used are Am7 F#dim7 F Bm7 E7.
*Made this version to make it a little easier for my students to play. If you want the original version in the original key click here https://youtu.be/o_xHOa4DsoQ
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Charlie Puth - One Call Away
item.description: FOR UKULELE: "One Call Away" as performed by Charlie Puth. Key of C with chords and lyrics. Chords: C, F, G, Am
